comments.comment: The constructor of the Motor class should call the constructor of the StateMachine base class.
The SetSpeed() function should use the BEGIN_TRANSITION_MAP and TRANSITION_MAP_ENTRY macros to define the state transitions based on the current state of the motor.
The Halt() function should use the BEGIN_TRANSITION_MAP and TRANSITION_MAP_ENTRY macros to define the state transitions based on the current state of the motor.
The ST_Idle state function should include the necessary processing for the Idle state.
The ST_Stop state function should include the necessary processing for the Stop state and transition to the Idle state via an internal event.
